Name: Arcane Intervention
Story Background: In a time of peril, an archmage sought the intervention of ancient forces, unleashing the raw power of the arcane to reshape reality itself.
Ability: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
Appearance Description: An archmage wielding crackling arcane energy, unleashing a surge of power that warps the fabric of reality, causing a targeted permanent to dissipate into ephemeral fragments. The artwork radiates vibrant shades of blue and silver, creating a mesmerizing, otherworldly effect that captures the essence of arcane intervention.
